description.value:
This weapon features stylized etchings of giants. A giant-killing weapon deals an additional @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage on a successful Strike against a giant. Mental damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's mental resistance.

On a critical hit, instead of being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1}, the giant must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save with the following effects.

Critical Success The giant is enfeebled 1 until the end of your next turn.

Success The giant is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn and takes @Damage[1d10[mental]] damage.

Failure The giant is enfeebled 2 for the next minute and takes @Damage[2d10[mental]] damage.

Critical Failure The giant is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 4} for the next minute and takes @Damage[4d10[mental]] damage.
